isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - SPEEDOMETER/TACHOMETER, GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 9800 - SPEEDOMETER AND TACHOMETER DIAGNOSTICS

svcsubsecinfo.para: Refer to Circuit Diagram Books CTS-5254, CTS-5254V or CTS-5254W in GROUP 08 - ELECTRICAL in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.

svcproc.title: DISPLAY FAILURE
svcproc.para: If the speedometer or tachometer gauge display is indicating a failure, the circuits serving the instrument in question must be checked for clean, tight, unbroken and non-shorted connections.

important.para: Be sure all relays in the vehicle are the suppressed type.
Make sure the accessory voltage to the cluster is within a range of 11 to 16 volts.
